title.narrative: CO PROGRAMME COORDINATION

description.narrative: Country Office Programme Coordination and technical excellence in policy and programmes, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews (Covid), Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Programme Effectiveness

DIRECTION DE LA SANTE FAMILIALE ET DE LA POPULATION
